name: Pacbase: Avoid Programs with too many Work Variables
description: Pacbase: Avoid Programs with too many Work Variables. The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will; it is currently set to 40.
output: Nb of batch or online programs with more than X variable declarations in the work area`!xA!`Value : Nb of declarations in the work area
rationale: For mainteability reasons, the number of work variables should not be too high.
